levelSelection.title: Choose Your Level
levelSelection.subtitle: Practice German grammar with endless interactive gap-fill exercises
levelSelection.h1: Practice German Grammar: Gap-Fill Exercises A1-C1
levelSelection.introText: Train German grammar with unlimited gap-fill exercises. Perfect for telc and TestDaF preparation. Practice verbs, articles, prepositions, subjunctive and more – free and without registration.
levelSelection.faqQ1: How do the gap-fill exercises work?
levelSelection.faqA1: Select your level (A1-C1) and a grammar topic. Fill in the gaps in the text and receive instant feedback with explanations.
levelSelection.faqA2: Yes, all exercises are completely free. You can practice unlimited without registration.
levelSelection.faqQ3: Are the exercises suitable for telc and TestDaF?
levelSelection.faqA3: Yes, our exercises cover all grammar topics that appear in telc and TestDaF exams (A1-C1).
levelSelection.metaTitle: Practice German Grammar A1-C1: Gap-Fill Exercises for telc & TestDaF | InfiniteGrammar
levelSelection.metaDescription: Practice German grammar with interactive gap-fill exercises: Verbs, articles, prepositions & more. ✓ A1 to C1 ✓ For telc & TestDaF ✓ Free ✓ Unlimited

comingSoon.title: Exercises Coming Soon
comingSoon.description: We're currently improving our exercise quality to provide you with the best learning experience.
comingSoon.message: We're working hard to create high-quality exercises that will help you master German grammar. Leave your email and we'll notify you as soon as they're ready!
comingSoon.emailLabel: Get notified when exercises are ready
comingSoon.successMessage: We'll send you an email as soon as the exercises are ready. Thank you for your patience!
comingSoon.errorEmailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
comingSoon.errorGeneric: Something went wrong. Please try again.
